overview: Over two years in the making Vicious Vic Grimes and New Jack vow to end their feud once and for all in a Free Fall Scaffold Match. The only way to win is to throw your opponent off a scaffold into a ring 40 feet below! Also witness the war between Lizzy Borden and Veronica Caine as they meet in a buck-naked match. Strip your opponent naked and be declared the winner! Plus - XPW World Champion Webb defends his title against G.Q. Money and Kaos defends the XPW Televeision Title against Angel and Chris Hamrick in a Gauntlet match.
title: XPW: Freefall
